titleStmt.title: Computer applications in terminology â€” Terminological markup framework

info.p: The Terminological Markup Framework (TMF) is an ISO standard developed to share and reuse terminological data by providing a framework designed to provide guidance on the basic principles for representing data recorded in terminological data collections. This framework includes a meta-model and methods for describing specific TMLs expressed in XML.
Some of the data categories from ISO 16642:2003 are used in DCR (ISO 12620:2009)
